member.name: IPropertyPageSite.GetLocaleID
member.summary: Retrieves the locale identifier (an LCID) that a property page can use to adjust its locale-specific settings.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the locale identifier. See Language Identifier Constants and Strings.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

listheader.description: The address in pLocaleID is not valid. For example, it may be NULL.

member.name: IPropertyPageSite.GetPageContainer

summary.para: Retrieves a pointer to the object representing the entire property frame dialog box that contains all the pages. Calling this method could potentially allow one page to navigate to another.
However, there are no container interfaces defined for this role, so this method always fails in the property frame implementation.

member.param: A pointer to an pointer variable that receives the interface pointer to the container object. If an error occurs, the implementation must set *ppUnk to NULL.

member.name: IPropertyPageSite.OnStatusChange
member.summary: Informs the frame that the property page managed by this site has changed its state, that is, one or more property values have been changed in the page. Property pages should call this method whenever changes occur in their dialog boxes.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Indicates the changes that have occurred. This parameter can contain one of the following values.

listheader.description: The values in the pages have changed, so the state of the Apply button should be updated.
Now is an appropriate time to apply changes.

member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG and S_OK.

member.name: IPropertyPageSite.TranslateAccelerator
member.summary: Passes a keystroke to the property frame for processing.
member.param: A pointer to the structure to be processed.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

listheader.description: The page site did not process the message.
The page site does not support keyboard processing.

member.name: IPropertyPageSite
member.summary: Provides the main features for a property page site object.
